name: Troubles from the Deep
description: The duality of water is reflected in Cantha's seas. They nurture the land's inhabitants with food sources and trade routes, yet harbor threats of naga and Unchained Risen within their depths.
requirement: Successfully complete events involving the naga and Unchained in Seitung Province.

bits.text: Defend the Ministry forces retaking Usoku's Watchtower.
Gather supplies and defend the tech as they repair the Emerald Park fallen mech.
Disrupt the Unchained ritual in Emerald Park.
Defend and repair the Haiju Cove water purifiers.
Defend the village's supplies from naga raiders in the Eastern Wilds.
Defeat the naga tide priest in the Eastern Wilds.
